title: Patali to function as independent MP in Opposition
body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MP Patali Champika Ranawaka says he will serve as an independent member in the Opposition starting from today (June 08).
Delivering a special statement in the parliament this morning, the lawmaker said he has conveyed his decision to the Opposition Leader and SJB Leader Sajith Premadasa in writing.
